channel.title: Gc on wbprime
channel.description: Recent content in Gc on wbprime

item.title: Jvm GC Options
item.description: General options -XX:+PrintFlagsFinal -XX:+PrintFlagsInitial -XX:+PrintCommandLineFlags -XX:+UnlockExperimentalVMOptions -XX:+UnlockDiagnosticVMOptions -XX:+ParallelRefProcEnabled java -server -XX:+UnlockExperimentalVMOptions -XX:+UnlockDiagnosticVMOptions -XX:+PrintFlagsFinal java -client -XX:+UnlockExperimentalVMOptions -XX:+UnlockDiagnosticVMOptions -XX:+PrintFlagsFinal GC See following image first: Young generation Serial 是 -client 默认的GC收集器，可以 -XX:+UseSerialGC 来强制开启 ParNew 是 -server 默认的GC收集器，可以 -XX:+UseParallelGC 来强制开启 Parallel Scavenge -XX:+UseParallelGC Old generation CMS CMS-initial-mark CMS-concurrent-mark CMS-concurrent-preclean CMS-remark CMS-concurrent-sweep CMS-concurrent-reset -XX:+UseConcMarkSweepGC -XX:CMSFullGCsBeforeCompaction=n -XX:ParallelGCThreads=n -XX:+ConcGCThreads=n Serail Old Parallel Old
